item.title: Banco BPM 提高对资产管理公司 Anima 的收购要约
item.description: Banco BPM SpA 提高了对资产管理公司 Anima Holding SpA 的出价。【原文：Banco BPM SpA raised its bid for asset manager Anima Holding SpA.】

item.title: 印度将与阿德诺克签署数十亿美元的液化天然气采购协议
item.description: 印度最大的两家国营石油公司本周将签署协议，从阿布扎比国家石油公司购买液化天然气，因为这个世界上人口最多的国家希望确保长期供应，以满足日益增长的能源需求。【原文：Two of India’s biggest state-run oil companies will this week sign agreements to buy liquefied natural gas from Abu Dhabi National Oil Co., as the world’s most populous nation looks to secure long-term supplies to meet growing energy demand.】

item.title: 西门子能源公司认为电力行业的蓬勃发展将推动今年的增长
item.description: 西门子能源股份公司（Siemens Energy AG）在上一季度公布了创纪录的订单积压后，预计不断增长的电力需求和向可再生能源的转变将推动今年的增长。【原文：Siemens Energy AG expects rising electricity demand and the shift to renewable energy to drive growth this year after posting a record order backlog in the last quarter.】

item.title: 莫迪重返美国，股市和经济繁荣褪色，影响力大不如前
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）这次面临着更严峻的挑战，他要向唐纳德-特朗普总统和美国投资者宣传印度是一个有吸引力的投资目的地。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi faces a tougher challenge this time in pitching the country as an attractive investment destination for President Donald Trump and US investors.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后铝价连续第二日下跌
item.description: 由于投资者在考虑美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对进口商品征收关税的影响，伦敦铝价连续第二天下跌。【原文：Aluminum in London declined for a second day as investors mulled the impact of US President Donald Trump’s tariffs on imports.】

item.title: 全球资金出逃，印度股市跌至 6 月以来最低点
item.description: 印度股市延续跌势，将印度股票大盘指数推至八个月低点，原因是人们担心，就在经济增长放缓之际，全球波动性正在加剧。【原文：Indian equities extended a selloff, pushing a broad gauge of the nation’s shares to an eight-month low, on concern global volatility is increasing just as economic growth slows.】

item.title: 德国没有好的替代方案
item.description:

And in Indonesia, no such thing as 82 million free lunches.

item.title: 哪吒 2》狂潮为发行商股票增值 55 亿美元
item.description: 中国动画电影《哪吒闹海2》创下的票房纪录继续为该片的制作和发行公司带来股市利好。【原文：The record-breaking box office run by animated Chinese film “Ne Zha 2” continues to be a stock-market boon for the company that produced and distributed it.】

item.title: 特朗普关税与德国难题在汉堡碰撞
item.description:
全球贸易战日趋白热化，德国最大的海港与整个国家一样，正严阵以待。【原文：

A global trade war is heating up and Germany’s biggest seaport, like the country at large, is steeling itself for what may be to come.

】

item.title: 英国经济衰退担忧加剧，数据将显示经济萎缩
item.description: 英国经济可能在第四季度出现萎缩，使英国重新濒临衰退，并给英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）及其推动经济增长的承诺带来更大压力。【原文：The UK economy may have shrunk in the fourth quarter, putting Britain back on the brink of recession and piling more pressure on Chancellor Rachel Reeves and her promise to turbocharge growth.】

item.title: 民意调查显示南非将在 2026 年降低通胀目标
item.description: 一项针对投资者和分析师的调查显示，南非可能会等到明年再降低通胀目标，以解决经济增长乏力和财政整顿等更为紧迫的问题。【原文：South Africa will probably wait until next year to lower its inflation target to address more pressing issues such as weak economic growth and fiscal consolidation, according to a survey of investors and analysts.】

item.title: 日本监管机构就重新包装日本国债的风险向地区银行发出警告
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士说，日本金融监管机构敦促该国的地区银行密切关注所谓的重新打包政府债券的投资风险，这种债券越来越受欢迎。【原文：Japan’s financial regulator urged the country’s regional banks to pay closer attention to the risks of investing in so-called repackaged government bonds, which are gaining popularity, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 精神航空拒绝了折扣竞争对手边疆航空的又一次进军
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines Inc.【原文：Spirit Airlines Inc. said it has rejected a refreshed takeover offer from rival Frontier Group Holdings Inc. and will instead press on with its own recapitalization plans.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税不确定性影响，日元跑输主要货币
item.description: 由于对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税计划可能包括日本的担忧加剧，日元有望创下一个多月以来的最长连跌纪录。【原文：The yen is on track for its longest losing streak in more than a month amid heightened concerns Japan may be included in Donald Trump’s tariff plan.】

item.title: 供应紧缩，韩国造币厂停止金条销售
item.description: 韩国造币厂暂时中止了金条的销售，使整个贵金属实物市场普遍紧张的迹象更加明显。【原文：South Korea’s Mint has temporarily suspended sales of gold bars, adding to signs of widespread tightness across markets for physical precious metals.】

item.title: 印度股市持续下跌，现金周转率下滑
item.description: 由于经济增长放缓和全球波动加剧，印度股市持续下挫，现货交易活动降至一年多来的最低点。【原文：Trading activity in the cash segment of India’s equity market slumped to the lowest in more than a year as a selloff in shares continues on slower economic growth and rising global volatility.】

item.title: 全球资金从印度转向中国，小型股崛起
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 摩根士丹利、瑞银加入看涨中国人工智能的大合唱
item.description: 中国人工智能推动的股市上涨得到了华尔街策略师的支持，他们表示，新发现的科技实力将有助于延续牛市。【原文：China’s AI-driven stock rally is drawing support from Wall Street strategists, who say the newfound tech prowess will help extend a bull run.】

item.title: 鸿海表示对收购雷诺持有的日产汽车股份持开放态度
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商鸿海精密工业股份有限公司正在考虑收购雷诺汽车公司持有的日产汽车公司股份，以实现合作。【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., the world’s largest contract electronics maker, is considering buying Renault SA’s stake in Nissan Motor Co. to make a partnership happen.】

item.title: 特朗普计划任命昆廷茨为美国衍生品监管机构负责人
item.description: 据彭博新闻社查阅的一份白宫发给国会山的文件显示，唐纳德-特朗普总统计划挑选安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）旗下 a16z 加密货币部门的政策主管布莱恩-昆滕兹（Brian Quintenz）来领导商品期货交易委员会。【原文：President Donald Trump plans to pick Brian Quintenz, the head of policy at Andreessen Horowitz’s a16z crypto arm, to lead the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, according to a document sent by the White House to Capitol Hill that was reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 投资者对 iPhone 人工智能抱有希望，阿里巴巴股价大涨
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团股价大涨逾 7%，此前《信息日报》报道称，苹果公司已开始与这家电子商务先驱合作，在中国推出人工智能功能。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s shares surged more than 7% after the Information reported that Apple Inc. has started working with the e-commerce pioneer to roll out artificial intelligence features in China.】

item.title: Klook 融资 1 亿美元，瞄准千禧一代和 Z 世代旅行者
item.description: 旅游预订平台 Klook 在由 Vitruvian Partners 领投的新一轮创始融资中筹集了 1 亿美元，使融资总额超过 10 亿美元，该公司的重点是千禧一代和 Z 世代旅行者。【原文：Travel booking platform Klook has raised $100 million in a new founding round led by Vitruvian Partners, bringing the total raised to more than $1 billion, as the company focuses on Millennial and Gen Z travelers.】

item.title: 陷入困境的波多黎各公用事业公司寻求联邦基金资助
item.description: 波多黎各陷入困境的电力公司可能需要自由邦政府的帮助来偿还遗留债务，才能解决长期停电问题，并解决其长达七年的破产传奇。【原文：Puerto Rico’s struggling power utility may need help from the commonwealth’s government to repay legacy debt if is to deal with chronic outages and resolve its seven-year bankruptcy saga.】

item.title: 尽管经济反弹，MSCI 仍将更多中国股票从指数中剔除
item.description: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：MSCI Inc. further trimmed Chinese stocks from its global benchmarks, underscoring the market’s diminishing appeal among investors despite a recent rebound.】

item.title: 全球基金转向巴基斯坦，84% 的股票涨势将得以延续
item.description: 去年，巴基斯坦的市场回报率在全球名列前茅，一些世界顶级基金经理再次青睐巴基斯坦的股票。【原文：Some of the world’s top money managers are once again favoring Pakistan’s stocks after the market returns last year were among the best globally.】

item.title: 日本要求豁免美国钢铁和铝关税
item.description: 东京要求美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将日本公司排除在新的钢铝关税之外。【原文：Tokyo asked US President Donald Trump to exclude Japanese companies from his fresh tariffs on steel and aluminum.】

item.title: 新西兰博彩业垄断计划有望为体育事业提供更多资金
item.description: 新西兰赛马部长温斯顿-彼得斯（Winston Peters）表示，新西兰计划将其博彩机构的垄断权扩大到在线投注，这将为赛马和其他体育项目创造更大的现金池。【原文：New Zealand’s plan to extend the monopoly of its betting agency to online wagering will create a bigger pool of cash for horse racing and other sporting codes, according to Racing Minister Winston Peters.】

item.title: 菲律宾即将退出监督机构的黑钱 "灰名单
item.description: 菲律宾最早可能在下周从全球黑钱名单中除名，这对这个东南亚国家来说是一个潜在的推动力，因为该国正在推进改革，以打击洗钱和资助恐怖主义的风险。【原文：The Philippines may be removed from a global dirty-money list as early as next week, a potential boost to the Southeast Asian nation following a reform push to counter money laundering and terrorist-financing risks.】

item.title: 印尼股票基准跌至 2021 年以来最低水平
item.description: 印尼基准股票指数连续五天暴跌，使该指数跌至三年来的最低点，并逼近技术性熊市。【原文：A five-day slump in Indonesia’s benchmark stock index has left the gauge at a three-year low and approaching a technical bear market.】

item.title: 黄金维持在 2,900 美元附近，交易员正在评估鲍威尔的讲话和贸易形势
item.description: 由于美国央行释放出不急于实施更多降息措施的信号，而且交易员们权衡了对全球贸易战可能有助于避风港需求的担忧，黄金在略低于纪录高点的位置企稳。【原文：Gold steadied just below a record high as the US central bank signaled that it’s in no hurry to deliver more interest-rate cuts, and traders weighed fears of a global trade war that could aid haven demand.】
